task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I see this is a public access request (is_public=true). According to the rules, public users cannot access internal documentation, wiki articles, or internal policies. Time tracking procedures are internal documentation.

input.message:
Thank you for your interest in joining Bellini Coatings! Information about our time tracking system and procedures is part of our internal documentation, which is only available to employees. Once you officially join the company, you'll receive access to our internal wiki where you can find detailed guides on time tracking, including how it works and why we do it.

For now, if you have any general questions about Bellini Coatings, please feel free to contact our HR department directly through our official website.

summary: denied_security: Thank you for your interest in joining Bellini Coatings! Information about our time tracking system
